UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A novel linear amphipathic beta-sheet cationic antimicrobial peptide with enhanced selectivity for bacterial lipids
Literature.Author: Blazyk J, Wiegand R, Klein J, Hammer J, Epand RM, Epand RF, Maloy WL, Kari UP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µg/ml)
